key.title: Maker Channel Key
key.description: This key is created for you once you activate the Maker Channel on IFTTT. Connect the channel on https://internal-api.ifttt.com/maker, then copy the key here.

triggers.description: Create triggers for every IFTTT Recipe you wish to use. The Event Name should match the field in the Recipe. If an Argument Type is specified, the Argument will be passed to IFTTT Action as `Event1`.
